titleStmt.title: A letter to the Right Honourable Sir John Holt, Kt. Lord Chief Justice of the Kings Bench; occasioned by the noise of a plot
Letter to the Right Honourable, my Lord Chief Justice Holt, occasioned by the noise of a plot.
titleStmt.author: Ferguson, Robert, d. 1714.

notesStmt.note: An edition of: Ferguson, Robert. A letter to the Right Honourable, my Lord Chief Justice Holt, occasioned by the noise of a plot.
Dated and signed at end: "Aug. 2. 1694, T.N." (i.e. Robert Ferguson).
Reproduction of the original in the Christ Church Library, Oxford.
